overview: Robert Kallir is the VP of Business Affairs of Empire Avenue Corp and brings over 30 years in the financial services industry. He has held exciting positions such as President, General Counsel, Corporate Secretary and Vice-President Operations of various financial institutions in addition to setting up and operating his own elevator company and consulting business. Most recently he was the Director of Business/Legal Services for acclaimed computer game developer BioWare and then Director of Business Development subsequent to the sale of BioWare to Electronic Arts.
